citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 A.M. on
10/16/2014. A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection
process. An updated itineary needs to send to the eastern regional office as required so that animal welfare
inspections can be conducted.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 A.M. on
10/16/2014.  A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection
process.  An updated itineary needs to send to the eastern regional office as required so that animal welfare
inspections can be conducted.
